title: 115_hr4842
content: Streamlining Permitting to Enable Efficient Deployment of Broadband Infrastructure Act of 2018 This bill amends the Communications Act of 1934 to exemptnbsp, certain broadband infrastructure project actions, includingnbsp. Granting a covered easement, placement and installation of a communications facility, and replacement of a communications facility located in an existing public right-of-way,nbsp. From environmental review requirements under the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969.
